vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Exo.6.18;
son of: Kohath (H6955);
brother of: Izhar (H3324), Hebron (H2275B) and Uzziel (H5816); married to Jochebed (H3115);
father of: Moses (H4872), Aaron (H0175) and Miriam (H4813)
Group of am.ram (עַמְרָם "Amram" H6019)
§ Amramites = see Aram "exalted"
a branch of the Kohathite family of the tribe of Levi and descendants of Amram, the father of Moses
vocabInfos._es_Definition: descendiente de Amram; tribu de Leví
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
暗蘭族 这个種族名稱 形容詞在希伯來文的意思是 見 暗蘭 "高貴的"
利未支派哥轄宗族的一支, 並為摩西父親暗蘭的後裔
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
暗兰族 这个种族名称 形容词在希伯来文的意思是 见 暗兰 "高贵的"
利未支派哥辖宗族的一支, 并为摩西父亲暗兰的后裔
